# Data cleaning

## Download data

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
df <- read_csv("data/countypres_2000-2020.csv")

```

## Pivot wider

```{r}
clean_data <- df |> 
  filter(mode == "TOTAL") |>
  group_by(year, state, county_name) |>
  mutate(share_of_votes = candidatevotes / totalvotes) |>
  filter(share_of_votes == max(share_of_votes)) |>
  ungroup()
  
```
